sentences.en: A parrot can mimic a person's voice.
A parrot can sometimes make you embarrassed.
sentences.cn: 鹦鹉有时候会让人很尴尬.

sentences.en: And the parrot would say , with great rapidity ,'Pieces of eight!
sentences.cn: 鹦鹉听后立刻急促地叫道:“八个 里亚尔!

sentences.en: Generations of students have learnt to parrot the standard explanations.
sentences.cn: 一代又一代学生学会了机械地重复这些标准解释。

sentences.en: He keeps a parrot in a birdcage in his living room.
sentences.cn: 他在客厅的鸟笼里养了一只鹦鹉.

sentences.en: He talks like a parrot and just repeat what he heard.
sentences.cn: 他只是鹦鹉学舌,拾人牙慧罢了!

sentences.en: It is not a writer's job to play the parrot.
John is really jealous of my new house — he's as sick as a parrot.
sentences.cn: 约翰非常嫉妒我有了一栋新房子,他是个十足的妒忌鬼.

sentences.en: Many literary academics simply parrot a set of impressive-sounding phrases.
sentences.cn: 许多文人只是机械地模仿一套听上去令人印象深刻的说法。

sentences.en: Mary is as sick as a parrot about losing her watch.
sentences.cn: 玛丽丢了表之后非常不高兴.
这是福林特船长—— 希尔弗 的绿色鹦鹉!

sentences.en: The bright plumage of a parrot made it beloved by people.
sentences.cn: 鹦鹉的一身华丽羽毛使人们很爱它.

sentences.en: The parrot squawked and flew away.
sentences.cn: 鹦鹉尖声叫了叫飞走了。

sentences.en: This parrot has the power to imitate human words.
sentences.cn: 这只鹦鹉有模仿人类语言的能力。

sentences.en: Under the old system pupils often had to stand to attention and repeat lessons parrot fashion.
sentences.cn: 在旧体制下，学生常常得立正站好，机械地重复课文。
我们鹦鹉学舌般机械地背诵诗歌。

trans.tran_en: a tropical bird with a curved beak and brightly coloured feathers that can be taught to copy human speech

trans.tran_cn: 机械地模仿，鹦鹉学舌般地重复
